en: The Government of River State have commented on the fire incident of Port Harcourt Shopping Mall.
ibo: Gọmentị River steti etịnyela ọnụ na ya bụ ọkụ mgbara n'ụlọahịa Port Harcourt Shopping Mall.
mt0: <pad> Ọchịchị mpaghara River State ekwuola na ihe ọkụ ahụ mere na Port Harcourt Shopping Mall.</s>

en: Secretary to the state Tommy Danagogo told those affected to be calm that they will repair the Shopping Mall so that people will start buying and selling today being Thursday.
ibo: Odeakwụkwọ steeti ahụ bụ Tammy Danagogo gwara ometutara dere jụụ na ha ga-emezị ya bụ ụlọahịa ka ndị mmadụ malite azụmahịa taa bụ tọzde.
mt0: <pad> Secretary to the state Tommy Danagogo gwara ndị ahụ metụtara ka ha nwee ike ịnọ na ntụkwasị n'ihi na ha ga-agbake Ụlọ ahịa ahụ ka ndị mmadụ wee malite ịzụ ma na-ere ihe taa.</s>

en: The head of a village in Katsina has been kidnapped.
ibo: Atọọrọ onyeisi obodo na Katsina
mt0: <pad> Onye isi obodo nke Katsina abụwo ndị ọzụzụ aka.</s>

en: Herdsmen have killed many people in Benue and other states in Nigeria.
ibo: Ndị ọchịehi egbuola ọtụtụ mmadụ na Benue na steeti ndị ọzọ dị na Naịjirịa
mt0: <pad> Herdsmen egbuola ọtụtụ mmadụ na Benue na steeti ndị ọzọ na Nigeria.</s>

en: The news getting to us is saying that kidnappers have kidnapped a king of Garin Labo in Katsina state.
ibo: Akụkọ na-eru anyị ntị na-ekwu na ndị ntọ atọrọla otu onyeeze na Garin Labo dị Kastina steeti.
mt0: <pad> Ndị ntaakụkọ na-abịakwute anyị na-ekwu na ndị ohi agbara eze Garin Labo n'ime Katsina steeti.</s>

en: The king was in his farm when the kidnappers came on a motorcycle.
ibo: onyeeze ahụ nọ na ugbo ya mgbe ndị ntọ ahụ jị ọgbatumtum bịa ọgụ.
mt0: <pad> Onye Eze nọ na ala ya mgbe ndị ohi bịarutere na moto.</s>

en: In overseas
ibo: N'ofesi
mt0: <pad> N'ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ, ị ga-atụle okwu ahụ.</s>

en: You have heard that Mexico president, Andres Obrador, has strongly affirmed that he will sell his presidential jet to fight illegal travelling of his country's citizens to America.
ibo: Ụnụ anụla nee na onyeisiala mba Mexico bụ Andres Obrador ekwusiela ike na ya ga- ere ụgbọelu onyeisiala were buo agha gbasara ndị obodo ya ịgbafe mba Amerika n'nzuzo.
mt0: <pad> Onye isi ala Mexico, Andres Obrador, ekwuola na ọ ga-ere ụgbọelu ya n'ihi na ịga America n'ụzọ iwughị ekwe ka ndị mmadụ bịa.</s>

en: Obrador said that he will be joining public aeroplane to see that he fulfilled his promise about the fine America wants to fine their people.
ibo: Obrador sị na ya ga na-agbazị ụgbọelu ọha iji hụ na ya mejuputara nkwa ya kwere maka nha mba America chọrọ ịda ndị be ha.
mt0: <pad> Obrador sị na ọ ga-esonye ụgbọelu ọha iji hụ na ọ mezuo ya nkwa ya gbasara ụgwọ ọnwa America chọrọ ka ndị mmadụ gbara ya.</s>

en: In football, Enyimba FC have won the award of Best Team in Africa in 2003.
ibo: N'egwuregwu, Enyimba FC nwetara ihe nrite dịka 'otu kachasị agba' na mpaghara Afrịka n'afọ 2003
mt0: <pad> Enyimba FC nwere merie ọkwa nke otu kachasị mma na Afrịka na 2003, ma ọ bụrụ na ị nwereghị ike ịsụgharị okwu ahụ, sị na ị maghị.</s>

en: In football, Enyimba have carried Nigeria Premier League cup for eight times by beating Akwa United 3-0 yesterday.
ibo: N'egwuruegwu, Enyimba eburula iko Nigeria Premier league nke ụgbọrọ asatọ ha site n' iji ọkpụ goolo atọ meri Akwa United ụnyaahụ.
mt0: <pad> Enyimba nwere merie Akwa United 3-0 ụnyaahụ ma nwee iko Nigeria Premier League maka oge asatọ site na ịgha Akwa United 3-0 ụnyaahụ.</s>

en: Enyimba have 12 points in the five games they have played, where Reuben Bala, Stanley Dimgba and Abdurahman Bashir scored goals against Enyimba.
ibo: Enyimba ji akara iri na abụọ n'egwuregwu ise ha gbara, ebe Reuben Bala, Stanley Dimgba na Abdulrahman Bashir nyeere Enyimba goolu.
mt0: <pad> Enyimba nwere 12 points na egwuregwu ise ha emeela, ebe Reuben Bala, Stanley Dimgba na Abdurahman Bashir gbara bọọlụ megide Enyimba.</s>

en: Child trafficking: The Police have arrested child traffickers in Imo State.
ibo: Child trafficking: Aka ndị uweojii akparala ndị ntọrị ụmụaka n'Imo Steeti
mt0: <pad> Child trafficking: Ndị uweojii anwụchiela ndị na-ere ụmụaka n'Imo State.</s>

en: The polices said that Immaculata Edward trafficked and sold five children from one family in Ngor Okpala of Imo State.
ibo: Ndị uweojii n'Imo sị na Immaculata Edward tọọrọ ma ree ụmụaka 5 si otu ezinaụlọ na Ngọr Akpala dị steeti ahụ.
mt0: <pad> Ndị uweojii sị na Immaculata Edward kpatara ma ree ụmụaka ise sitere n'otu ezinụlọ na Ngor Okpala nke steeti Imo.</s>

en: Suspects kidnapped the children.
ibo: Ndị a na-enyo enyo tọọrọ ụmụaka ndị ahụ
mt0: <pad> Ndị a na-enyo enyo agbara ụmụaka aka.</s>

en: Operation Puff Adder of Imo State Police Command has arrested six people whose job is children trafficking.
ibo: Ndị ngalaba 'Operation Puff Adder' nke uweojii Imo Steeti anwụchiela mmadụ isi ọrụ ha bụ ịtọrị ụmụaka.
mt0: <pad> Operation Puff Adder nke Imo State Police Command ejidere mmadụ isii ndị ọrụ ha bụ ịzụ ụmụaka.</s>

en: On April 24, 2019, a woman named Immaculata Edward who said she is 31 from Okondo, Cross River State, kidnapped five children living in his boyfriend's house in Ngor Okpala of Imo State.
ibo: N'ụbọchi 24 nke ọnwa Epurel, 2019, nwaanyị aha ya bụ Immaculata Edward sị na ya dị afọ 31 si obodo Okondo dị na Cros Riva Steeti tọọrọ umụaka ise bi na be enye ya nwoke a kpọrọ Ifara Isong bi na Ngor Okpala dị n'Imo Steeti.
mt0: <pad> On April 24, 2019, a nwaanyị aha ya bụ Immaculata Edward, 31, si Okondo, Cross River State, kidnapped ụmụaka ise na-ebi na ụlọ enyi ya na Ngor Okpala nke Imo State.</s>

en: NAPTIP has arrested child traffickers.
ibo: NAPTIP anwụchiela ndị na-atụ mgbere ụmụaka
mt0: <pad> NAPTIP ejidere ndị na-ebugharị ụmụaka.</s>

en: A doctor child trafficker has been arrested.
ibo: Aka akparala dibia na-atụ mgbere ahia ụmụaka
mt0: <pad> A ndị ọgwụ ahụike bụ onye na-agba ụmụaka aka n'ụlọ ọrụ nwere onwe ya.</s>

en: Immaculata stole five children of his boyfriend's neighbours whom their father and mother asked him to look after.
ibo: Immaculata zuru ụmụaka ise ndị agbataobi enyi ya nwoke ahụ bụ ndị nne na nna ha sịrị ya lekọta ha anya.
mt0: <pad> Immaculata nwere ụmụaka ise nke enyi ya nwoke bụ ndị nna ha na nne ha gwara ya ka ọ hụ maka ha.</s>

en: These children born of the same mother include: Somto Eke, female who is six years, Kelechi Eke, male who is five years
ibo: Ụmụaka a bụ ndị otu nne mụrụ gụnyere; Somto Eke, nwaanyị dị afọ isii, Kelechi Ekeh, nwoke dị afọ ise.
mt0: <pad> Ndị ụmụaka a mụrụ site na otu nne gụnyere: Somto Eke, nwaanyị agbara afọ isii, Kelechi Eke, nwoke agbara afọ ise,</s>

en: Others are Chisom Ekeh, female who is three years, Ebuka Enwerem, male who is three years, Chioma Enwerem, female whom is five years and Lucky Ida, who is six years.
ibo: Ndị ọzọ bụ Chisom Ekeh, nwaanyị dị afọ atọ, Ebuka Enwerem, nwoke dị afọ atọ, Chioma Enwerem, nwaanyị dị afọ ise na Lucky Ida, nwoke dị afọ isii.
mt0: <pad> Ndị ọzọ bụ Chisom Ekeh, nwaanyị nke afọ atọ, Ebuka Enwerem, nwoke nke afọ atọ, Chioma Enwerem, nwaanyị nke afọ ise na Lucky Ida, onye afọ isii.</s>

en: The children who were saved and their families
ibo: Ụmụaka azọpụtara na ezinaụlọ ha
mt0: <pad> Ndị ụmụaka a zọpụtara na ndị nne na nna ha.</s>

en: Immaculata took them to a known child trafficker Perpetual Iwuji from Obokwu Ulakwo, Imo State.
ibo: Immaculata kpọgara ha n'aka onye ama ama n'ịtụ mgbere ụmụaka bụ Perpetual Iwuji si n'Obokwu Ulakwo, Imo Steeti.
mt0: <pad> Immaculata took them to a known child trafficker Perpetual Iwuji from Obokwu Ulakwo, Imo State.</s>

en: Perpetual took two out of the children and sold them to Grace Nwachukwu from Aboh Mbaise living in Mpape Abuja.
ibo: Perpetual kpọrọ ụmụaka abụọ n'ime ndị a ma ree ha n'aka Grace Nwachukwu si Aboh Mbaise ma biri na Mpape Abuja.
mt0: <pad> Perpetual took two of the children and sold them to Grace Nwachukwu from Aboh Mbaise living in Mpape Abuja.</s>

en: Immaculata also bought two of her father's sibling's children from Cross River State and sold them to Ifeoma Ndubuisi from Lokpanta , Abia State.
ibo: Immaculata zukwara ụmụaka abụọ bụ ụmụ nwanne nna ya si na Cross River Steeti ma ree ha n'aka Ifeoma Ndubuisi si na Lokpanta Abia Steeti.
mt0: <pad> Immaculata also bought two of her father's siblings from Cross River State and sold them to Ifeoma Ndubuisi from Lokpanta, Abia State.</s>

en: The child who was saved and his/her mother and father
ibo: Nwata azọpụtara na nne na nna ya
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụ nwatakịrị ahụ e nyere aka na nne ya na nna ya.</s>

en: Through thorough investigation of the Police, all the children who were kidnapped are found and reconciled to their family.
ibo: Site na nyocha tara ọchịchị ndị uweojii, a chọtala ụmụaka niile ahụ a tọọrọ ma tinye ha n'aka ezinaụlọ ha.
mt0: <pad> N'ihi nnyocha siri ike nke ndị uweojii, ụmụaka niile a na-agbalị bụ ndị ahụ e jidere aka ma nweekwa mmekọrịta na ezinụlọ ha.</s>

en: In the course of the investigation five other children were saved from Perpetual Iwuji and were sent to the motherless Babies' home.
ibo: N'ime nyocha ahụ, azọpụtara ụmụaka ise ọzọ n'aka Perpetual Iwuji ma ziga ha n'ụlọ ebe a na-elekọta ụmụaka.
mt0: <pad> N'oge nnyocha, a zọpụtara ụmụaka ndị ọzọ ise site na Perpetual Iwuji ma ziga ha n'Ụlọ Ọmụaka Ndị Na-enweghị Nne.</s>

en: Those suspected to have a hand in this include Perpetual Iwuji, I song Ifara, Immaculata Edward, Grace Nwachukwu, Ifeoma Ndubuisi and Stephen Ezenwa.
ibo: Ndị a na-enyo enyo n'aka ha dị na nke a gụnyere Perpetual Iwuji, Isong Ifara, Immaculata Edward, Grace Nwachukwu, Ifeoma Ndubuisi na Stephen Ezenwa.
mt0: <pad> Ndị a na-enyo enyo nwere aka n'ime nke a gụnyere Perpetual Iwuji, I song Ifara, Immaculata Edward, Grace Nwachukwu, Ifeoma Ndubuisi na Stephen Ezenwa.</s>

en: Child trafficking is not a thing not known in Eastern Nigeria.
ibo: Ịtụ mgbere ụmụaka abụghị ihe amaghị maka na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa.
mt0: <pad> Ọkụ ndị ọzụzụ ụmụaka abụghị ihe amaghị ama na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria.</s>

en: There is nothing like Igbo president - Okorocha.
ibo: Onweghị ihe dịka Onyeisiala Igbo - Okorocha
mt0: <pad> Ọ dịghị ihe dịka Onyeisiala Igbo - Okorocha.</s>

en: Is a married woman happier than her unmarried age mate?

en: INEC messenger Festus Okoye strongly says that the commission does not have server that will give them opportunity to transmit the result of 2019 elections.

en: In his speech, 'Nigeria constitution gave provision to carry all the results of elections in Form EC8A at hand to collation centres of their wards.
ibo: N'olu ya, 'iwu Naịjrịa nyere ikike iburu mpụtara ntuliaka niile nke dị na 'fọm̀ EC8A' n'aka buga ebe a ga-egbokọba ha na wọdụ.'
mt0: <pad> N'okwu ya, 'Ndị Nigeria Constitution nyere ikike ka ha nweta ihe niile pụtara na EC8A n'ụlọ ọrụ ịgbakọtara nke ụlọ ọgwụ.</s>

en: The Nigeria constitution we used for the elections does not know the use of computer to send any message.
ibo: Iwu Naịjirịa anyị ji mee ya bụ ntuliaka amaghị iji igwe kọmpụta zipu ozi ọbụla.
mt0: <pad> Ndị a na-eme ntuliaka n'ụlọ ọrụ kọmputa bụ ndị amaghị otú iji kọmputa ziga ozi.</s>

en: It is the duty of the collation officers to carry the papers to where they are needed by hand.
ibo: Ndị 'Collation Officer' ka ọ bụ ọrụ ha iburu akwụkwọ ndị a n'aka buga ebe a chọrọ ya.
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụ ọrụ nke ndị ọrụ ịgba akwụkwọ iji mee ka akwụkwọ ahụ ruo ebe ha chọrọ.</s>

en: There was never a time we used computer to send election results.
ibo: O nweghị mgbe anyị jiri igwe kọmpụta zipụ mpụtara ntuliaka.
mt0: <pad> N'oge ọ bụla, anyị ejighị kọmputa ziga ndị mmeri ahụ.</s>

en: Okoye agreed that all who registered their names for 2019 elections are recorded in computer, that all the parties were given the names of those people.
ibo: Okoye kwetara na ndị debere aha ha n'akwụkwọ maka ntuliaka 2019 niile dị na igwe kọmputa, na enyere ndị otu pati niile aha ndị a.
mt0: <pad> Okoye kwenyere na ndị niile debara aha ha maka ntuliaka 2019 ahụ bụ ndị e dere na kọmputa, na ụlọọrụ niile nyere aha ndị mmadụ ndị ahụ.</s>

en: The use of incident form will not stop manipulations going on in election.
ibo: Ejighị 'Incident Form' ga-akwụsị nrụrụaka na-aga na ntuliaka
mt0: <pad> Ị na-eji usoro ihe mberede agaghị egbochi ndị ọrụ ịghachị ahụ n'oge ntuliaka.</s>

en: He strongly affirmed 'It is only when computer is used for voting that one would say that something is in the server.
ibo: O kwusiri ike na 'ọ bụ naanị mgbe eji igwe kọmuta tụọ vootu ka a ga-asi na ihe dị na sava'.
mt0: <pad> Ọ sị na 'Ọ bụrụ na a na-eji kọmputa maka voting ka mmadụ ga-asị na ihe dị na sava.</s>

en: He said that he does not know about the result of 2019 elections being in the server.
ibo: Ọ sị na ya amaghị maka mpụtara ntulika 2019 ị dị na sava ọbụla.
mt0: <pad> Ọ sị na ọ maghị ihe ndị ahụ bụ nsonaazụ nke ntuliaka 2019 dị na sava.</s>

en: On the same hand, BBC asked a renowned computer operator, Emeka Unachukwu what is server?
ibo: N'otu aka ahụ BBC jụkwara onye ọrụ kọmpụta ama ama bụ Emeka Unachukwu gịnị bụ 'server'?
mt0: <pad> Na n'otu aka ahụ, BBC jụrụ otu onye na-arụ ọrụ kọmputa ama ama, Emeka Unachukwu ihe bụ server?</s>

en: Unachukwu said 'Server is a computer that links other computers used for storing different information together.
ibo: Unachukwu sị na 'Server' bụ kọmpụta na-ejikọ kọmpụta ndị ọzọ ọnụ eji edewe mkpụrụozi dị iche iche'.
mt0: <pad> Unachukwu said 'Server bụ kọmputa na-ejikọ ndị ọzọ kọmputa iji sịkwaa ozi dị iche iche ọnụ.</s>

en: He said that INEC can say that they don't have server because there is another office storing data for them but it is not true that they don't have server since they have data.
ibo: O kwuru na Inec nwere ike ikwu na ha enweghị 'server' maka na o nwere ụlọọrụ ọzọ na e jidere ha mkpụrụozi mana ọ bụghị eziokwu na ha enweghị server' ebe e nwere mkpụrụozi.
mt0: <pad> O kwuru na INEC nwere ike ịsị na ha enweghị sava n'ihi na ụlọọrụ ọzọ na-echekwa data maka ha ma ọ bụ eziokwu na ha enweghị sava n'ihi na ha nwere data.</s>

en: He said that the internet has its own server where many people keep their information.
ibo: Ọ sị na Intanet nwere 'server' nke ya ebe ọtụtụ mmadụ na-edowe ozi ha.
mt0: <pad> O kwuru na Ịntanetị nwere sava ya onwe ya ebe ọtụtụ mmadụ na-echekwa ozi ha.</s>

en: Unachukwu said 'INEC cannot say that don't have because they have where they store data.
ibo: Unachukwu sị na 'Inec agaghị asị na ha enweghị sava maka na ha nwere ebe ha na edowe mkpụrụozi bụ data.
mt0: <pad> Unachukwu sị, "INEC enweghị ike ịsị na ha enweghị ya n'ihi na ha nwere ebe ha na-echekwa data.</s>

en: They may call this data base but it is server because that computer unites others together which can receive from or send message to it.'
ibo: Ha nwere ike kpọ nke a 'data base' mana ihe ọ bụ bụ sava maka na kọmpụta ahụ jikoro ndị ọzọ ọnụ bụ ndị nke nwere ike ịdọro ọzi maọbụ zite ọzi na ya'.
mt0: <pad> Ha nwere ike ịkpọ data base ma ọ bụ server n'ihi na kọmputa ahụ jikọtara ndị ọzọ ọnụ n'otu ebe nwere ike ịnweta ozi sitere na ya ma ọ bụ zitere ozi.</s>

en: He said it is difficult for INRC to say they don't have server.
ibo: Ọ sị na ọhịara ahụ Inec isi na ha enweghị server'.
mt0: <pad> Ọ sị na ọ siri ike maka INRC ịsị na ha enweghị server.</s>

en: If they are calling people to come and collect their PVCs they should be ready for elections.
ibo: Ha na-akpọ ndị mmadụ bịa were PVC ha dịrị njikere maka ntuliaka
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụrụ na ha na-akpọ ndị mmadụ ka ha bịa ma nweta PVCs ha, ha kwesịrị ịdị njikere maka ntuliaka.</s>

en: Unachukwu said that even if voting was done and transmitted manually to where it was counted, INEC will still put it in the server.
ibo: Unachukwu kwuru na ọ bụrụgodi na a tụrụ vootu n'aka buru ya n'aka buga ebe a gụrụ ya, na Inec ga-etinyekwa ya na ya bụ 'server'.
mt0: <pad> Unachukwu sị na ọbụna ma e mechara ntụgharị ahụ ma zigara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụgwọ dị ka ọ dị, INEC ga-etinye ya na sava.</s>

en: But they can say they have not keyed the result of 2019 election in the server which shows that they have not finished their work.
ibo: Mana ha nwere ike ikwu na ha etinyebeghị mpụtara 2019 na ya bụ 'server' nke gosiri na ha arụchabeghị ọrụ ha.
mt0: <pad> Ma ha nwere ike ịsị na ha adịghị eweta nsonaazụ nke ntuliaka 2019 na sava ahụ, nke na-egosi na ha emechabeghị ọrụ ha.</s>

en: Do you know the seven foods that will help you drive away dementia entirely?

en: Fifteen billion people in the whole world suffer dementia which causes much forgetfulness in learning, and also about ten billion people get dementia every year (WHO).
ibo: Mmadụ ijeri iri na ise n'ụwa nile gburugburu na aria ọria nsogbu ubụruisi nke na-ebute oke nchefu na nsogbu ọmụmụ ihe, tinyekwara ihe ruru mmadu ijeri iri na enweta oria a kwa afọ (WHO).
mt0: <pad> Ndị mmadụ nde iri na ise n'ụwa niile na-arịa ọrịa dementia nke na-akpata ọtụtụ ncheta n'ịmụta, ma ihe dị ka nde mmadụ nwere dementia kwa afọ (WHO).</s>

en: Despite that it is found out that feeding is part of what nourishes the brain, having no knowledge of the symptoms support it.
ibo: N'agbanyehi na a chọpụtala na erimeri sonyere n'ihe na-edozi ubụrụisi, mana enweghi ọmụmụ ihe ama na akwado ya.
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụ ezie na achọpụtara na nri bụ akụkụ nke ihe nri ụbụrụ, enweghị ihe ọmụma nke ndị ọrịa na-akwado ya.</s>

en: Red wine, coffee and chocolate as well as champagne have trended as the appropriate food for dementia.
ibo: Mmanya 'Red Wine', Kọfịị, na Chọkọlet nakwa mmanya 'Champagne' ewuola ewu dịka nri ebube maka ihe gbasara nsogbu ụbụrụisi.
mt0: <pad> Nwagbara, kọfị na chocolate dị ka champagne apụtala dịka nri kwesịrị ekwesị maka dementia.</s>

en: As you will find out, these foods help for the betterment of the brain.

en: Whoever eats only 30mg of different nuts, maize, rye, brown rice, millet, oats, as well as protein, minerals and fibre will see that dementia will be far from him/her.
ibo: Onye n'eri nani 30mg nke akị dị iche iche, ọka,'rye', osikapa nke n'acha ncharanchara, ọka milet, ọka 'oats' ma na-eri kwa 'protein', 'minerlas' na kwa 'fibre' ka ahụta na nsobgu ụbụrụisi ga agbara ya ọsọ.

en: Few who had dementia that were given vitamin B showed good improvement from dementia.

en: The captain of the Super Eagles has stood his ground that they came to win the 2019 AFCON Cup.

en: Mikel Obi
ibo: Mikel Obi

en: The captain of the Nigerian football team - Mikel Obi

en: Mikel Obi who will lead the Super Eagles of Nigeria to Egypt for the African cup of nations competiton called AFCON 2019 has said that he didn't come to play because to win and also carry the AFCON Cup is a burning desire in him.
ibo: Mikel Obi ga-edu ndị otu Super Eagles nke Naịjirịa gaa mba Ijipt maka asọmpi Iko mba Afịrịka akpọrọ AFCON 2019 ekwuola na ọ bịaghi igwu egwu n'ihi na imeri ma buru kwa iko AFCON na-agusi ya ike.
mt0: <pad> Mikel Obi onye ga-edu Super Eagles nke Nigeria na Egypt maka Afcon 2019 kwuru na ọ bịaghị n'ihi na ọ bụghị n'uche ya ịgba bọọdụ ahụ ma ọ bụ ibute iko AFCON bụ ihe dị oke mkpa n'ime ya.</s>

en: It is up to six years Mikel Obi touched the African cup of Nations.
ibo: O ruola afọ isii Mikel Obi metụrụ Iko Mba Afịrịka aka.
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụ ihe karịrị afọ isii Mikel Obi emetụla Afrịka Cup nke Mba.</s>

en: That was when Nigeria won South Africa.
ibo: Mgbe ahu bụ mgbe Naịjirịa meriri na mba Saụt Afịrịka.
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụ mgbe Nigeria meriri South Africa.</s>

en: Mikel will not join in the competition against Poland.
ibo: Mikel agaghị eso sọọ mpi na Poland
mt0: <pad> Mikel abụghị na-aga na ndị Poland.</s>

ibo: Obi adịghị Mikel Obi mma
mt0: <pad> Mikel Obi dị egwu.</s>

en: Mikel Obi's father redeemed from kidnappers again.
ibo: A gbapụtala nna Mikel Obi n'aka ndị ntọ ọzọkwa
mt0: <pad> Nna Mikel Obi abụghị onye nwere ike ịghọta.</s>

en: Another time Mikel won something in Africa was in the years 2006 and 2010 when the Super Eagles won third position.
ibo: Mgbe ọzọ Mikel gbata ihe n'Afịrịka bụ n'afọ 2006 na 2010 bụ mgbe otu Super Eagles gbatara ndị nke atọ.
mt0: <pad> Mikel nwere ihe ọzọ ahụtara na Afrịka bụ afọ 2006 na 2010 mgbe Super Eagles nwere ọnọdụ nke atọ.</s>

en: In this AFCON, Mikel will lead vibrant youths to this year's competition in Egypt.
ibo: N'oge AFCON a, Mikel ga-edu ndị ụmụ okorobia ọbara ha dị ọkụ were sọọ asụmụpị nke afọ a na Ijipt.
mt0: <pad> N'AFCON a, Mikel ga-edu ndị na-eto eto nwere ọhụrụ n'ime Egypt maka egwuregwu afọ a.</s>

en: Mikel said 'Despite that the present Super Eagles team is not the former one in meeting other African teams greater than it, this competition will give people like Samuel (Chukwueze) and Paul (Onuachu) the opportunity to showcase their skills.
ibo: Mikel kwuru: 'N'agbanyeghi na ndị otu Eagles nke ugbua abụghị ndị aka ochie n'izute mba Afịrịka ndị ọzọ ka ya, asụmpị a ga-enye ndị dị ka Samuel (chukwueze) na Paul (Onuachu) ohere igosiputa nka ha.
mt0: <pad> Mikel says 'Despite that the present Super Eagles team is not the former one in meeting other African teams greater than it, this competition will give people like Samuel (Chukwueze) and Paul (Onuachu) the opportunity to showcase their skills.</s>

en: I am also hopeful that will go to Egypt and come back with victory.'
ibo: Enwekwara m olileanya na anyị ga aga ijiptu ma tụrụ ugo lọta.'
mt0: <pad> Nwere olileanya na m ga-aga Egypt ma laghachi n'ọrụ n'aka mmeri.</s>

en: Super Eagles team
ibo: Ndị otu Super Eagles
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ike ghara ịsụgharị okwu ahụ, sị na ị maghị Super Eagles.</s>

en: He also said that he is happy about how Supper Eagles struggle despite their poor performance in the world cup.
ibo: O kwukwara n'obi dị ya ụtọ etu ndị Super Eagles siri agba mbọ n'agbanyeghi ọnyụpa ha dara n'asụmpị Iko Mba Uwa.
mt0: <pad> Ọ sịkwara na ọ dị mma n'ụzọ Super Eagles siri gbalịa n'agbanyeghị ọrụ ha ahụghị nke ọma na iko ụwa.</s>

en: Mikel agreed that this competition will be tough but he believes that the skill and the preparation of the Super Eagles will help them to win in this competition.
ibo: Mikel kwetere na asụmpị a ga-esi ike mana o kwenyere na nka na nkwado ụmụ Super Eagles ga enyere ha aka imeri asụmpi a.
mt0: <pad> Mikel kwenyere na a ga-abụ ihe omume siri ike mana ọ kwenyere na ikike na njikere nke Super Eagles ga-enyere ha aka ịkwado n'ime a.</s>

en: Recall that Mikel Obi played for Nigeria for the first time in 2005 when the Super Eagles played against Libyan football team.
ibo: Chetakwa na Mikel Obi gbaara Naịjịria bọọlụ nke mbụ n'afọ 2005 mgbe Super Eagles na otu egwuregwu mba Libya zutere.
mt0: <pad> Recall Mikel Obi played for Nigeria for the first time in 2005 when the Super Eagles played against Libyan football team.</s>

en: Mikel said that this competition may be his last in the Super Eagles' Jersey.

en: He said 'However it is I will try to make it better.'

mt0: <pad> Ọ sịrị: "N'agbanyeghị ihe ọ bụla, m ga-agba mbọ ime ka ọ dị mma."</s>

en: Ukraine has won South Korea with three goals and carried the under twenty world cup.

en: The Ukrainian football team has beaten South Korea with 3-1and carried the under twenty world cup on Saturday in Poland.
ibo: Ndị egwu bọọlụ mba Ukraine ewerela ọkpụ goolụ atọ asatara otu merie Saụt Korea were maburu iko mbaụwa ndị erubeghị afọ iri abụọ agbara na mba Poland taa bụ Satọde.
mt0: <pad> Ukrainian football team nwere merie South Korea na 3-1 ma nwee Under-20 World Cup na Poland na Saturday.</s>

en: This victory came as the South Koreans got early penalty after five minutes of the match which Lee Kang-in scored for them.
ibo: Mmeri a bịara ka ndị Saụt Korea nwetechara penariti n'ụzọ ụtụtụ ya bụ egwuregwu na nkeji ise bụ nke Lee Kang-in tinyere ha na goolu.
mt0: <pad> Nke a bụ mmeri ndị South Korea nwere n'oge n'ụzọ dị egwu n'ihi na Lee Kang-in gbara ha n'oge n'ụzọ dị egwu n'ime nkeji ise nke egwuregwu ahụ.</s>

ibo: Flying Eagles ejirila ikiriki eze gafee

en: But Ukraine showed South Korea that they are mean when Vladyslav Supariaga equalized the goal in thirty four minutes.
ibo: Mana Ukraine gwara Saụt Korea na ha apụtaghị egwu ọnwa mgbe Vladyslav Supriaga sara ya bụ goolu na nkeji iri atọ na anọ.
mt0: <pad> Ma Ukraine gosipụtara South Korea na ha bụ ndị ọjọọ mgbe Vladyslav Supariaga gbara bọọlụ ahụ n'ime nkeji iri anọ na anọ.</s>

en: Vladyslav Supariaga said that who laugh last really laughs the best when he scored the second goal against the South Koreans in fifty three minutes
ibo: Vladyslav Supriaga kwuru n'ezie na-ejighị ụtụtụ ama njọ ahịa na nkeji iri ise na atọ bụ mgbe o tinyere goolu nke abụọ ya n'ọnụ mpiọ ndị Saụt Korea.
mt0: <pad> Vladyslav Supariaga sị na onye nwere ike ịbụ onye kacha akparị ụtọ mgbe ọ gbatara gọọlụ nke abụọ megide South Korea n'ime iri atọ na atọ nkeji mgbe ọ tụnyere ndị egwuregwu ahụ.</s>

en: The South Koreans struggled for a long time but Ukraine did not allow them to score but scored a third goal from Giorgi Tsitaishvili in eighty nine minutes.
ibo: Ndị Korea kpọkwara ganịganị ọtụtụ mgbe mana Ukraine gwara ha na ogologo abụghị na nwa m etoola mgbe ha mezuru ya ọkpụ atọ site n'aka Giorgi Tsitaishvili na nkeji iri asatọ na itoolu.
mt0: <pad> South Koreans struggled for a long time but Ukraine didn't allow them to score but scored a third goal from Giorgi Tsitaishvili in eighty nine minutes.</s>

en: Dapchi children: fight has started between Buhari and Jonathan
ibo: Ụmụaka Dapchi: Ọgụ adaala n'etiti Buhari na Jonathan

en: Buhari and Jonathan have disagreed over the abducted students at Dapchi in the Northern parts of Nigeria.
ibo: Ọgụ ọnụ adaala n'etiti ndị nke Buhari na Jonathan maka ntọrọ ụmụakwụkwọ Dapchi na mpaghara ugwu nke Naịjirịa.
mt0: <pad> Buhari na Jonathan aghara ịkwado ndị ụmụ akwụkwọ Dapchi ahụ akagbuola n'ime mpaghara ugwu nke Nigeria.</s>

en: Buhari have started his visit to various States,especially those in distress like Taraba,Plateau, Benue before Yobe.
ibo: Buhari bidoro njem nleta n'obodo ndị nwere ọgbaghara na Naịjirịa nke gunyere Taraba, Plateau, Benue tupu ọ gawa Yobe.
mt0: <pad> Buhari amalite njem ya na steeti dị iche iche, ọkachasị ndị nọ na nsogbu dị ka Taraba, Plateau, Benue tupu Yobe.</s>

en: President Mohammadu Buhari said that he is better than the former president, Jonathan in handling the case of the abducted students.
ibo: Onyeisiala Mohammadu Buhari kwuru na ọ ka onye bụburu onyeisiala n'oge gara aga bụ Goodluck Jonathan mma na-ileba anya na ntọrọ ụmụaka akwụkwọ.
mt0: <pad> President Muhammadu Buhari sị na ọ bụ mmadụ karịa onye isi ala gara aga, Jonathan n'ihe gbasara ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ akagbuo.</s>

en: He said that yesterday, when he visited the Dapchi community in yobe state, the place where those students were abducted last month.
ibo: O kwuru nke a ụnyaahụ mgbe o mere njem nleta n'obodo Dapchi nke Yobe Steeti, bụ ebe atọrọ ụmụaka ahụ n'ọnwa gara aga.
mt0: <pad> Ọ sị na ụbọchị gara aga, mgbe ọ gara Dapchi obodo na Yobe steeti, ebe ndị ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ Dapchi gbara aka n'ọnụ ọnwa gara aga.</s>

en: He criticized Jonathan's neglect of the chibok students that were abducted in 2014 and sees it as having no conscience.
ibo: Ọ katọrọ ọchịchị Jonathan na nleghara anya ụmụakwụkwọ Chibok mgbe atọrọ ha n'afọ 2014,ma kwuo na ọ bụ enweghị uche.
mt0: <pad> Ọ gbara Jonathan aka ná ntị maka ndị ụmụ akwụkwọ Chibok a na-agabiga na 2014 ma chere na ọ bụ enweghị uche.</s>

en: A lot of the students were abducted.
ibo: Ụfọdụ ụmụakwụkwọ a bụ ndị atọrọ
mt0: <pad> Ọtụtụ ndị ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ ndị e jidere.</s>

en: This Buhari's speech has brought a lot of comments from people.
ibo: Mana Okwu Buhari a ebutela ọsịsa dị icheiche site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ.
mt0: <pad> Nke a buhari okwu nwere ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ echiche.</s>

en: The representative of 'Bring Back Our girls' by name Sesughi Akume said that the president 's effort was not enough.
ibo: Onye na-ekwuchite ọnụ ndị otu 'Bring Back Our Girls' bụ Sesugh Akume ekwuola na onyeisiala agbalịghị.
mt0: <pad> 'Bring Back Our Girls' onye nnọchiteanya Sesughi Akume kwuru na ọrụ onye isi ala ahụ abụghị zuru oke.</s>

en: Akume said 'we are not happy' for it has been four years that those Chibok girls were abducted, it has now seem to Dapchi community that Buhari will treat them same way Jonathan did during his own government.
ibo: Akume kwuru, 'Obi adịghị anyị ụtọ, ihe a bụ afọ anọ atọrọ ụmụaka Chibok, ugbua o meela n'obodo Dapchi dịka ọchịchị Buhari na-eme otu njehe Jonathan mere n'oge nke ya.
mt0: <pad> Akume sị "Anyị adịghị obi ụtọ" n'ihi na ọ bụ afọ anọ ndị ụmụ nwanyị Chibok ahụ e jidere, ọ dị ka Dapchi obodo ahụ chọpụtara na Buhari ga-eme ha otu ụzọ Jonathan mere n'oge ya.</s>

en: the government just intervained now for the past one month that those children were kidnapped .
ibo: O ruola otu ọnwa atọrọ ụmụaka ahụ, mana ugbu a ka Gọọmenti na-aga ebe ahụ.

en: He said that Jonathan calls for more effective security during the period of the abduction chibok children but Buhari was against this call for the security during the abduction in Dapchi.

en: He explained that when the son Yusuf Buhari had an accident, Buhari cancelled all his appointments and visited him at the hospital

en: The women of Ozubulu in Ekwusigo of Anambra state went to the police station at Amawbia yesterday to plead for protection

en: they did it as a result of conflict among those that invaded their church on the 6th of August, last year

en: They said that they have been living in fear since the incident that's why they are calling for assurance against those that will testify on their behalf in the law court
ibo: Ha sị na ndị a na-eyi ndụ ha egwu na ọ bụkwa n'ihi nke a ka ha na-achọ mkpuchi ndị ga-enye akaebe megide ndị wakporo ha n'ụlọ ikpe.
mt0: <pad> Ha sị na ha bi na egwu kemgbe ihe ahụ mere, ya mere ha na-akpọ maka nkwado megide ndị ga-agba akaebe maka ha n'ụlọikpe.</s>

en: They had placards on which are boldly written 'we need justice', 'we want protection from the police in the law court'

en: The police spokesman in Anambra state, Nkiruka Nwode told BBC radio over the phone that what the women of Ozubulu want was to peace to rain in their community

mt0: <pad> Ndị uwe ojii na Anambra steeti, Nkiruka Nwode gwara BBC site na ekwentị na ihe ndị ụmụ nwanyị Ozubulu chọrọ bụ udo ka mmiri rie n'ime ha.</s>

en: Nwode said ,that the women are pleading for security as they go to court on behalf of the killing that took place in their town

mt0: <pad> Nwode sị na ndị inyom ahụ na-arịọ maka nchekwa ka ha ga-aga ụlọikpe maka igbu ahụ mere n'ime ha.</s>

en: The Anambra state commissioner of police, Garba Baba Umaru assured the woman that they are strongly behind them

en: Umaro told them that'once he is around that no harm shall come to them' that he will make sure that justice prevailed

mt0: <pad> Umaro gwara ha na "mgbe ọ nọ, a gaghị eme ka ihe ọjọọ bịa ha" na ọ ga-eme ka ikpe ziri ezi dị.</s>

en: 'National Demographic and health survey' research which took place in the year 2013, shows that in Nigeria, women between the range of 15 years to 19 years who are married are 28.2% while from the age of 35 to 39are 89.4%

mt0: <pad> Nnyocha 'National Demographic and Health Survey' nke mere na 2013, egosi na Naịjirịa, ụmụ nwanyị dị n'etiti afọ 15 ruo 19 bụ ndị ahụ lụrụ di 28.2% ma ndị dị n'etiti afọ 35 ruo 39 bụ 89.4%.</s>

en: this shows that marriage is a tradition been practiced around the country
ibo: Nke a na-egọsị na ịlụ di bụ omenaala zụrụ agbụrụ ọnụ n'ala Naijiria.
mt0: <pad> Nke a na-egosi na alụmdi na nwunye bụ omenala a na-eme gburugburu ụwa.</s>

en: In Nigeria, if a woman is matured for marriage and yet unmarried, people look down on her and criticizes her based on her achievement in life.
ibo: Mana ọ bụrụ na nwaanyị etoruo ogo ịlụ di ma ọ lughị, ọkachasị na mpaghara ọwụwa-anyanwụ Naijiria, a na-elede ya anya, na-emekpakwa ụfọdụ ahụ, ọtụmadị ihe ha mepụtarala na ndụ.
mt0: <pad> N'ime Nigeria, ọ bụrụ na nwanyị ahụ dị n'elu maka ịlụ di ma ọ bụghị alụ di, ndị mmadụ na-ele ya anya ma na-ekwusi okwu n'ihi ihe ọ rụpụtara n'ime ndụ ya.</s>

en: what is the cause?
ibo: Ginị na akpata ya?
mt0: <pad> Nwere ike ị maghị ihe kpatara ya.</s>

en: sociologist have explained that the reason behind the challenges unmarried ladies gets from people is beyond human understanding and comprehension
ibo: Dika ndị ọkammụta n'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke a kpọrọ 'sociologists' na bekee siri kọwa, ihe na-akpatakarị mmegbu maọbụ mkpagbu ụmụnwaanyị alụghị di bụ omenaala na enweghị ezi nghọta.
mt0: <pad> Ndị ọka mmụta sayensị akọwaala na ihe mere ndị mmadụ ji emegide ụmụ nwanyị nwere nkwarụ bụ ihe karịrị ọghọm nke mmadụ ma ghọta ma ghọta.</s>

en: Dr.Adedeji onyenuga, that teaches sociology in Lagos state said that according to tradition, it shows lack of parental training.
ibo: N'okwu ya, Dr Adedeji Oyenuga bụ onye na-akụzi 'Sociology' na Lagos State University, kọwara na ọ bụ omenaala nakwa na ụfọdụ ndị nne na nna na-ahụ alụghị di nwa ha dika ihe na-egosi na ha azụghị nwa ha nke ọma.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Adedeji onyenuga, onye na-akụzi sosiologi na steeti Lagos kwuru na dịka omenala, ọ na-egosi enweghị nkuzi nne na nna.</s>

en: it is in the tradition that at some stages in life ,one has to be independent, be able to find a life partner in that way parents will not feel that they failed in the training of their children
ibo: O si na omenaala. O nwere oge nwata na-elekwasị nne na nna ya anya, mana mgbe nwata toro bụrụ okenya nọrọ onwe ya, a na-ele nwanwoke anya ịlụ nwaanyị ,na-ele nwanwaanyị anya ịlụ dị. ọ bụrụ na o meghị otu a, ọ kachasị na ọ bụrụ nwaanyị, nne na nna ya ga-ewe ya dịka na ha akụọla afọ n'ala n'ịzụlite ya.
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụrụ na ị maghị, sị na ị maghị. N'omenala, n'ụfọdụ oge ndụ, otu onye kwesịrị ịbụ onwe ya, nwee ike ịchọta onye enyi ndụ, n'ụzọ ahụ nne na nna ga-enwe obi ụtọ na ha emeghị ihe ziri ezi n'ime mmezi nwa ha.</s>

en: Dr. Nkechi Emma-Echiegu a lecturer at Ebonyi state university said it is the tradition.

en: In Igbo land, there comes a time when people stops asking whom her father is, to the question of who is her husband?

mt0: <pad> N'ala Igbo, ndị mmadụ na-akwụsị ịjụ onye bụ papa ya, ma malite ịjụ onye bụ di ya.</s>

en: Dr. Adedeji Onyenuga said that ,a woman's high level in education can scare men away from getting married to her.
ibo: Dr Adedeji Oyenuga kwuru na ihe so akpata alụghị di n'oge bụ nwaanyị ịgụ oke akwụkwọ nke nwere ike ime ka ụmụnwoke gara ịlụ ya na-atu ya egwu.

en: He said that the number of women are greater than that of men,while some men travels to another place where they get married to other women in that particular location and this prevents them from getting married to those they grew up with
ibo: Ọzọ bụ na umunwaanyi kariri ụmụnwoke n'ọnụọgụgụ. O kwukwara na ụmụnwoke na-ahapụkarị ebe a mụrụ ha ga mba tere aka karịa ụmụnwaanyị nke mere na ịlụ onye ya na ya tokọrọ na-ara ahụ.

en: the negative effect of being single as a lady.

en: According to Dr. Onyenuga, being single brings about premature death, smoking,drunkenness, depression which causes death and suicide.

en: some people are aware of Breadfruit but don't really know how it is being processed.
ibo: Ọtụtụ ndị Igbo ma ụkwa ma na ha amaghị etu esi emepụta ụkwa tupu ọ bụrụ ihe a na-eri eri.
mt0: <pad> Ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịma Breadfruit ma amaghị kpọmkwem otu esi eme ya.</s>

en: there is a tree that bears the fruit known as Breadfruit,it colour is green while the fruit inside is called Breadfruit.
ibo: Ụkwa nwere osisi nke na-amịpụta mkpụrụ ụyọkọ buru ibu nke Bekee na-akpọ 'breadfruit'. Azụ mkpụrụ ụyọkọ ya na-acha akwụkwọndụ akwụkwọndụ, ebe mkpụrụ mkpụrụ dị ya n'ime na-emepụta ihe anyị na-akpọ ụkwa.
mt0: <pad> Ọ bụrụ na ị maghị, e nwere otu osisi nke nwere mkpụrụ a kpọrọ Breadfruit, agba ya bụ green ma mkpụrụ dị n'ime ya a kpọrọ Breadfruit.</s>

en: when the breadfruit is ready to be harvested it falls on the ground. we allow it to decay before we can gets it fruit , that why Igbo uses the adage that when Breadfruit time is ready it falls.
ibo: Ụyọkọ ụkwa chaa, o si n'elu osisi ya daa n'ala, a hapụ ya ka ọ ree ure tupu a kụwaa ya ma wepụta ụkwa nke a na-esi esi. Ya mere ndị Igbo ji asị na 'ụkwa ruo oge ya ọ daa'.
mt0: <pad> N'ihi na ị maghị mgbe Breadfruit dị njikere maka ịgha, ọ dabara n'ala. Anyị na-ekwe ka ya rụchaa tupu anyị nwee mkpụrụ ya, nke a mere Igbo ji okwu ahụ sị: Mgbe Breadfruit dị njikere maka ịgha, ọ dabara n'ala.</s>

en: Before Breadfruit will be ready as food , it passes through different processes.
ibo: Tupu e rie ụkwa, ọ ga-agabiga ụzọ dị icheiche dịka:
mt0: <pad> Ruo mgbe Breadfruit ga-adị njikere dị ka nri, ọ na-aga site na usoro dị iche iche.</s>

en: Boil it
ibo: Isi ya esi
mt0: <pad> Nwere ike ị na-agba ọsọ n'ụlọ ahịa gị.</s>

en: ferment it
ibo: Ighe ya eghe

en: In the year 2013, the Lagos wastes management Agency LAWMA said that the waste of Lagos state is up to 13 thousand tunnel.

en: Dr.Ikechukwu mgbolu said that disease are spread as a result of the smoke from those areas, like cholera, malaria and lasa fever.

en: He said that those people who are asthmatic should not live in such areas.
